reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are very soft with just the right amount of moisture, I highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The ECO SOUL 100% Bamboo Premium Baby Wipes are a fantastic choice for parents who prioritize eco-friendly and sustainable baby products. They contain 99% purified water and are hypoallergenic, making them gentle on your baby's delicate skin.These wipes are not only biodegradable but also organic, ensuring that they are both safe for your baby and the environment. With a pack of 256 wipes, you'll have an ample supply to keep your baby clean and happy. Overall, if you're looking for baby wipes that are environmentally conscious and effective, ECO SOUL's Bamboo Premium Baby Wipes are an excellent choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars NOT FOR ME!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice baby wipes
reviews.reviewText: Good value pack of baby wipes.The price is fair and quality is good.The bamboo baby wipes are not as soft as the others. But they work just fine.The wipes texture is stronger, but not as absorbing as others.This brand of baby wipe sizes are smaller, sometimes have to use multiple layers per time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality wipes that get the job done w/o any scent, A+ for sensitive skin -- smaller than usual
reviews.reviewText: These are nice wipes! One thing I noticed immediately is that the sizing is a bit smaller than average. I actually use these for cleaning up my parrots’ messes or wiping down my bunny’s fur. Since they are intended for delicate baby skin, the wipes are gentle enough for my exotic pets’ sensitive systems, ensuring no irritation. Plus, they have ZERO SCENT, which is a huge win for me. They are slightly less moist than most wipes I’ve used in the past, but nevertheless, they seem to clean effectively and easily freshen up my furry and feathered friends. I also appreciate the sustainability of bamboo – I do work on lowering my carbon footprint and cut down on using disposables but some things don’t yet have an even replacement. Whether using these for babies or pets, these wipes are versatile enough to handle any mess, and they are a true asset in my house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars These do a great job cleaning with such gentle ingredients
reviews.reviewText: You do not need strong, harsh soaps, and chemicals to thoroughly clean a baby during a diaper change. These are soft and gentle, with good quality ingredients and leave the babies skin soft and fresh and clean. Nothing added your baby doesn’t need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are very soft but also strong, not like Huggies or pampers wipes that rip when you’re trying to pull one out of the bag. I feel like the size of the wipe runs a little smaller than the ones I usually get. They don’t have a scent which is great, they’re hypoallergenic and my eczema prone baby has done well with them and not having any type of reaction. The ingredients look like every other type of wipe. These are compostable, which is great as well but I’m used to rolling dirty wipes into the dirty diaper and making little diaper footballs to get tossed into the trash so I don’t see myself trying to use them for compost but I’m sure there’s lots of others who are into having a compost bin and would probably like these a lot.They do come in a 3 pack and nicely packaged together so it’s a pretty presentable bag of wipes if you plan on gifting any at a baby shower these would be nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had 2 packages both mold.I’m not sure if I didn’t use them quick enough or what but unfortunately they both molded.
